# Goldsniffer (Trait)
## Overview
**Goldsniffer:** Your keen senses lead you to hidden treasures. You gain a +2 trait bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks related to metals, jewels, and gemstones.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 62
